mapper.select: select sub_id, pro_id, sta_id, sub_intro, submit_time, director_audit, director_comment, client_comment from project_procedure_ms.submitrecord where sub_id = #{subId}
select sub_id, pro_id, sta_id, sub_intro, submit_time, director_audit, director_comment, client_comment from project_procedure_ms.submitrecord limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into project_procedure_ms.submitrecord(pro_id, sta_id, sub_intro, submit_time, director_audit, director_comment, client_comment) values (#{proId}, #{staId}, #{subIntro}, #{submitTime}, #{directorAudit}, #{directorComment}, #{clientComment})
mapper.update:
update project_procedure_ms.submitrecord
pro_id = #{proId},
sta_id = #{staId},
sub_intro = #{subIntro},
submit_time = #{submitTime},
director_audit = #{directorAudit},
director_comment = #{directorComment},
client_comment = #{clientComment},
where sub_id = #{subId}
